QuestData.Title: The Will of the Warchief
QuestData.Description: Kargath was once one of the Horde's greatest heroes.$B$BHe now wears the false mantle of Warchief. Bring me his namesake weapon so that we can remember the champion he once was, rather than the monster he's become.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: His will is no longer his own.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Warchief Kargath's Fist to Stone Guard Stok'ton inside the Shattered Halls of Hellfire Citadel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you proof of Kargath Bladefist's defeat?
QuestData.RewardText: We should not forget the orc Kargath once was, nor the lessons to be learned from his downfall.
